scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:setup && (DATABASE_URL="postgresql://test_user:test_password@localhost:5433/test_db" vitest run --config src/vitest.integration.config.ts; npm run test:integration:teardown)
scripts.test:integration:setup: cd .. && docker compose -p mtbsplit-test -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d || echo 'Database already running'
scripts.test:integration:teardown: cd .. && docker compose -p mtbsplit-test -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec server npx prisma migrate dev --name
